column1: Shown below are your scores on the six broad "factor" scales and the 25 narrow "facet" scales of the HEXACO-PI-R. (Each factor scale is listed
in bold, with its four facet scales indented below it. An additional facet scale, Altruism, is related to several factors and is listed separately.)
